column2: "Nna Israelmba nyinara fiir edzi
column3: na mboanofo no behyiaa dɛ nyimpa kor
column4: ofi Dan araa kodu Beer-seba
column6: na wɔkɔr EWURADZE hɔ wɔ Mizpa."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara
column3: mekyerɛ Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu etsitsir no beyii hɔnho kyerɛe wɔ Nyankopɔn ne man bagua no mu
column4: mbarimba mpem ahaanan a wɔnam anamɔn mu a wɔtwe mfona."

column2: "Na Benjaminmba no tsee dɛ Israelmba esi mu kɔ Mizpa. Na Israelmba no see dɛ
column3: Ka kyerɛ hɛn
column4: emumuyɛ a ɔtse dɛm yi duaa dɛn bae?"

column2: "Na Levinyi no
column3: ɔbaa a wodzii no ewu no no kun no
column4: buaa na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Mebaa Gibea a ɔyɛ Benjamin dze no mu
column6: emi na mo nwewe dɛ yɛrobɔsoɛ hɔ."

column2: "Na Gibeamba no soɛɛr mo do
column3: na wotwaa ofi no ho hyiae wɔ me ntsi anadwe no; emi na wɔdween dɛ woboku me
column4: na mo nwewe no wɔhyɛɛ no nda araa ma owui."

column2: "Na musuoo mo nwewe no mu mutwitwaa no esinesin
column3: na mosomaa ma wɔdze kɔr Israel egyapadze asaase nyinara do: osiandɛ ɔayɛ ebusudze na ekyiwadze wɔ Israel mu."

column2: "Hwɛ hom Israelmba
column3: hom nyinara nye yi
column4: hom nkyerɛ hom adwen na hom apam wɔ ha."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara gyee bom dɛ nyimpa kor
column3: see dɛ
column4: Hɛn mu biara ronnkɔ n’asesee mu
column5: nkyii so hɛn mu biara remman ne fie."

column2: "Na afei iyi nye adze a yɛdze bɛyɛ Gibea; yɛbɔtwe tonto akɔ hɔn do;"
"na yeeyiyi Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu nyimpa mu du
column3: na apem mu ɔha
column4: na mpemdu mu apem
column5: ma wɔaakɛfa edziban abrɛ ɔman no
column6: na sɛ wɔba Benjamin Gilead a
column7: wɔaabɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ nkwaseadze a wɔayɛ no wɔ Israel mu no nyinara tse."

column2: "Nna Israel mbarimba no nyinara boaa ano kɔr kurow no do
column3: nna wɔabɔ mu dɛ nyimpa kor."

column2: "Na Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw somaa nyimpa ma wɔkɔr Benjamin ebusuakuw nyinara mu
column3: dɛ
column4: Ebɛn emumuyɛ nye dza wɔayɛ no wɔ hom mu yi?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom nyi mbabanyin ehuhufo a wɔwɔ Gibea no mma
column3: ma yenku hɔn
column4: na yɛmfa nyi mbusu no mfi Israel. Na Benjaminmba ammpɛ dɛ wotsie hɔn nuanom Israelmba no ndze."

column2: "Na Benjaminmba no poon hɔnho fii nkurow nkurow mu behyiaa Gibea dɛ wɔrokɔ akɛnye Israelmba no ako."
"Na wɔkaan Benjaminmba a wofifi nkurow nkurow mu no da no ara ma wɔyɛɛ mbarimba a wɔtwe mfona mpemeduonu esia
column3: na ɔsor Gibeamba a wɔkan hɔn a wɔyɛ mbarimba a wɔapa hɔn ahaesuon."

column2: "Nkorɔfo yi nyinara mu mbarimba a wɔapa hɔn ahaesuon no wɔyɛ abankumfo; obiara tum tow nhwi itsiabo
column3: na ɔmmfom."

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba no
column3: sɛ Benjamin nnka ho a
column4: wɔkan hɔn mbarimba mpemahaanan a wɔtwe mfona: woyinom nyinara wɔyɛ mbarimba akofo."

column2: "Na Israelmba no soɛree
column3: na wosii mu kɔr Bɛtɛl
column4: na wokebisaa Nyankopɔn hɔ apam; na wɔsee dɛ
column5: Woana na ondzi kan mfow nkɔ nkɛnye Benjaminmba no nko mma hɛn? Na EWURADZE see dɛ

column2: "Na Israelmba no soɛɛr anapa
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Gibea do."

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba no tui kɔr dɛ wɔnye Benjamin rokɔko; na Israel mbarimba no baa hɔn do mpasuar wɔ Gibea."
"Na Benjaminmba no puei fi Gibea
column3: na wɔbɛkaa Israelfo mu mbarimba mpemeduonu ebien guu famu sɛɛ hɔn da no ara."

column2: "Na nkorɔfo no
column3: Israel mbarimba no
column4: hyɛɛ hɔnho dzen
column5: na wɔbaa mpasuar bio wɔ beebi mbrɛ da a odzi kan no wɔbaa hɔn mpasuar no ara."

column2: "Na Israelmba no sii mu kɔree kosui wɔ EWURADZE enyim araa ma okodur ewimbir; na wobisaa EWURADZE dɛ
column3: Ana montwe mbɛn bio menye mo nua Benjamin mba no nkɔko? Na EWURADZE see dɛ
column4: Hom mfow nkɔ no do."

column2: "Na Israelmba no twee bɛnee baa Benjaminmba no do da a otsia ebien no."
"Na Benjamin fiir edzi fi Gibea baa hɔn do da a otsia ebien no
column3: na wɔkaa Israelmba mu mbarimba a wɔtwe mfona mpemduawɔtwe guu famu bio sɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Nna Israelmba no nyinara
column3: na ɔman no nyinara sii mu kɔr Bɛtɛl
column4: na wokosui
column6: na wɔkyeen kɔm da no ma okodur ewimbir; na wɔbobɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Nna hɔ na nda no mu no Nyankopɔn n’ahyɛmudaka no wɔ
column3: na"

column2: "na Finehas
column3: Eleazar ne babanyin
column4: Aaron ne babanyin no
column5: na ogyina enyim wɔ nda no mu. Na Israelmba no bisaa EWURADZE
column7: Ana menda ho ara mumpue bio nkɛnye mo nua Benjamin mba no nkɔko
column8: anaa mingyaa? Na EWURADZE see dɛ
column9: Fow kɔ; na ɔkyena medze no bɛhyɛ wo nsa."

column2: "Na Israel dze atsɛweefo hyehyɛe bɔɔ Gibea ho aprɔw."
"Na Israelmba no sii mu kɔr Benjaminmba no do da a otsia ebiasa no
column3: na wɔbaa mpasuar wɔ Gibea do
column4: dɛ nkan no."

column2: "Na Benjaminmba no puei kehyiaa nkorɔfo no
column3: na wɔtwee hɔn fii kurow no mu; na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrobobɔ na worukuku nkorɔfo no mu bi dɛ nkan no
column4: wɔ atsempɔn a kor kɔ Bɛtɛl
column7: na wokum Israel mu mbarimba bɛyɛ eduasa."

column2: "Na Benjaminmba no see dɛ
column3: Woridzi hɛn enyim nkogu dɛ nkan no. Na Israelmba no see dɛ
column4: Wɔmma yenguan
column5: na yɛntwe hɔn mfi kurow no mu mbra atsempɔn do."

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba no nyinara soɛree fii hɔn tsenabew
column3: na wɔbaa mpasuar wɔ Baal-tamar: na Israel atsɛweefo no fii edzi fii hɔn ananmu
column4: mekyerɛ Maare-geba ho a."

column2: "Na mbarimba mpemdu a wɔapa hɔn wɔ Israel nyinara mu bopuee Gibea nkyɛnmu
column3: na ɔko no mu yɛɛ dzen: nna Benjaminfo dze wonnyim dɛ mbusu bi abɛn hɔn."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kaa Benjamin gya wɔ Israel enyim: na Israelmba no sɛɛ Benjamin mu mbarimba a wɔtwe mfona mpemeduonu enum na nyimpa ɔha da no."
"Nna Benjaminmba no hun dɛ wɔabɔ hɔn egu: na Israel mbarimba no maa Benjamin kwan
column3: osiandɛ hɔn enyi daa atsɛweefo a wɔdze hɔn ahyehyɛ Gibea do no do."

column2: "Na atsɛweefo no yɛɛ ntsɛm
column3: na wokotui hyɛɛ Gibea do; na atsɛweefo no twee hɔnho piin kan
column4: na wɔdze afona bɔɔ kurow no nyinara."

column2: "Afei asɛnkyerɛdze a wɔahyɛ da Israel mbarimba no na atsɛweefo no ntamu nye dɛ
column3: wɔmma wusiw kɛse kumbɔɔ mfi kurow no mu nsoɛr nkɔ sor."

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba no daan hɔnho wɔ ɔko no mu
column3: na Benjamin hyɛɛ ase bobɔe na okunkum Israel mbarimba mu nyimpa bɛyɛ eduasa: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Ogu ara na woegu wɔ hɛn enyim dɛ nkan no ɔko no no mu."

column2: "Na aber a gyawusiw no hyɛɛ ase fi kurow no mu wɔ wusiw kumbɔɔ dum ho soɛree kɔr sor no
column3: Benjaminfo hwɛɛ hɔn ekyir
column4: na
column6: kurow mu no nyina rupun wusiw rofow kɔ sor."

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba no daan hɔnho
column3: na nketsenketse kyeer Benjamin mbarimba no: na wohun dɛ mbusu ato hɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔdaan hɔn ekyir wɔ Israel mbarimba no enyim dze faa sar no do kwan do; na ɔko no kyeer hɔn do; na hɔn a wofi nkurow nkurow do bae no sɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn mu."
"Wɔkaa Benjaminfo hyɛɛ mu bɔɔ aprɔw
column3: na wotsiiw hɔn
column4: na wɔpaam hɔn wɔ hɔn ahomgyebea

column2: "Na Benjamin mu mbarimba mpemduawɔtwe totɔree; woyinom nyinara wɔyɛ mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam."
"Na wɔdaan hɔnho guanee faa sar no do afamu kɔr Rimmon ɔbotan no ho: na wɔkɔr hɔn atwee wɔ atsempɔn do twitwaa mbarimba mpemenum gui; na wɔtaa hɔn do twetweetwe dze kodur Gidom
column3: na wokunkum hɔn mu mbarimba mpemebien."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi da no Benjamin mu hɔn a wɔtotɔree nyinara wɔyɛ mbarimba mpemeduonu enum a wɔtwe mfona; woyinom nyinara yɛ mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam."
"Na mbarimba ahaesia ara na wɔdaan hɔnho guanee faa sar no do afamu kɔr Rimmon ɔbotan no ho
column3: na wɔkɛtsenaa Rimmon ɔbotan no mu abosoom anan."

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba no saan hɔn ekyir bio baa Benjaminmba no do
column3: na wɔdze afona kunkum hɔn
column4: kurow mu no
column5: na anyɛmbowa nyinara: nkyii so wɔtotoo nkurow nkurow a wohunii nyinara mu gya."
